content.raw: I’m not sure if this API would be useful in the future. What do you think about combining the two function into one `transformAxisAlignedBox` function? Can you take a look at the changes in the [abb\_dome\_transform](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/67c4832601a8414820bccf0aa56eda85ed8f23f1) branch and see if they look good to you? I changed function to lowercase so it follows non-member function naming scheme, and changed `_worldPose` arg to `_pose` since this function should be able to accept any transform.
